dmca.title: Subpoena Report
dmca.body:
I had verizon dsl.  I received the copy of the subpoena late.  I didn't figure I had anything to worry about with it because I have never downloaded music.  I have never done nor has anyone in my household done what this subpoena is stating.  A couple months after receiving this, I received a letter from a lawfirm stating that these record companies are going to sue me.

I feel that either Verizon has given wrong information to these people or somehow my computer was broken into.  This is causing me a lot of grief.  I am a disabled single mom with a young child and am not sure how I am going to afford to defend myself on this.

When I had Verizon DSL, I had a lot of problems with them.  I do know they changed my ISP address at least three times.  I know this because on at least one occasion when I had problems with my service, they changed it.  I don't know if that would have anything to do with this or not.
